{"id":729247784,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1655983068,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"27 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/729247784/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"19.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int left = 0, right = height.size() - 1;\n        int res = 0;\n        int maxLeft = 0, maxRight = 0;\n        \n        while(left <= right)\n        {\n            if(height[left] <= height[right])\n            {\n                if(height[left] > maxLeft) maxLeft = height[left];\n                else res += maxLeft - height[left];\n                left++;\n            }\n            \n            else\n            {\n                if(height[right] > maxRight) maxRight = height[right];\n                else res += maxRight - height[right];\n                right--;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
